about_the_game:
Asha Empire: Exodus is an intense single-player action game set in the Asha Galaxy on the moon Sirina. The story revolves around evacuation operations after rebels seize control. Players step into the roles of Imperial Commanders Rexis or Kyra, tasked with managing the evacuation and retrieving 10 crucial databanks from rebel-occupied sectors. Experience a thrilling narrative filled with strategic combat, exploration, and decision-making that influences the outcome of the game.

Key Features:

1. Immersive Storyline: Experience the gripping narrative of an empire on the brink of collapse. Make critical decisions that influence the course of the evacuation, the fate of the empire, and the lives of your comrades.

2. Dynamic Combat: Engage in fast-paced combat against rebels, malfunctioning machines, and mutated beings. Utilize a variety of weapons and abilities, including grenades that spread fire, release smoke, or create devastating explosions.

3. Strategic Planning: Plan your missions carefully as you navigate through 6 distinct sectors of the Sirina station. Balance the urgency of collecting databanks with the safety of evacuees. Your choices will determine the success of the evacuation and your survival.

4. Exploration and Discovery: Explore the diverse and dangerous environments of Sirina, from underground research facilities and sewer systems to military ports and the moon's surface. Uncover hidden secrets, valuable resources, and crucial information that can aid your mission.

5. Multiple Endings: Your decisions, performance, and exploration efforts will lead to different outcomes, offering high replayability and encouraging players to explore various strategies and paths.

6. Open World Experience: Enjoy a seamless and expansive world, allowing players to explore freely, interact with various factions, and tackle challenges without the constraints of linear level-based gameplay.

7. Unique Enemies: Face the Nirsh Free Army rebels and deal with the consequences of genetic experiments gone wrong, as mutants roam freely throughout Sirina, adding to the challenges of each mission.

Join the fight to save the empire in Asha Empire: Exodus, and immerse yourself in a world of strategic combat, deep narrative, and thrilling action. Will you ensure the safe evacuation of Sirina and secure the vital information needed for the empire’s survival?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT or Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required.
